# SCNParticleBirthDirection.constant

**Case**

The emitting direction is the same for all particles.

## Declaration

```swift
case constant
```

## Discussion

When using this mode, the [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNParticleSystem/emittingDirection] property determines the base direction for all particles, and the [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNParticleSystem/spreadingAngle] property adds random variation to this direction.

## Constants

- **SCNParticleBirthDirection.surfaceNormal**: The emitting direction for each particle is along the surface normal vector at the point where the particle is emitted.
- **SCNParticleBirthDirection.random**: SceneKit randomizes the emitting direction for each particle.
